item.title: Need help with General Graardor
item.dc:creator: @bloodmaniet bloodmaniet
item.description:
@bloodmaniet wrote:

Ok guys i need some help. General Graardor is bugged. everytime(sometimes) when you go to attack him the client crashes… i have the right ints and models. here is the ints.

}
if(i == 1115) { // NPC ID
aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60.anInt1406 = anIntArray72[630];
class5.method165(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60); // Collect original NPC data
class5.aStringArray66 = new String[5];
class5.aStringArray66[1] = “Attack”;
class5.anIntArray94 = new int[2]; // Number of models the NPC uses
int changedColors = 1; // Number of model colors changed on the NPC
class5.anIntArray76 = new int[changedColors];
class5.anIntArray70 = new int[changedColors];
class5.anIntArray76[0] = 61; // Original model color
class5.anIntArray70[0] = 926; // Changed model color
class5.anIntArray94[0] = 10490; // 27789
class5.anIntArray94[1] = 10491; // 27785
class5.aString65 = “General Graardor”; // NPC name
class5.anInt61 = 624; //combat level
class5.aByteArray89 = “The mighty lord Bandos!”.getBytes(); // NPC description
}

The models are 10490 and 10491 i am trying to figure out why the client crashes everytime you go to attack general graardor… =\ if someone could help me i would appreciate it…

This what it says when it crashes the client…:

Exception in thread “Thread-4” java.lang.NullPointerException
at Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub3.method454(Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub3.java:72)
at client.method104(client.java:8005)
at client.method146(client.java:11928)
at client.method102(client.java:7706)
at client.method9(client.java:8656)
at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:122)
at client.run(client.java:4392)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

Read full topic
